post.html:
What to expect

  • It will be somewhat hands-on.
  • We will be using Go.
  • There will be some stuff to install.






















Learning goals

  • You will learn how to:
    • reorganize pipeline steps into a Dagger pipeline.
    • run Dagger a pipeline locally.
    • run Dagger a pipeline in a GitHub Actions workflow.
post.markdown:
# What to expect - It will be somewhat hands-on. - We will be using Go. - There will be some stuff to install.





















## Learning goals - You will learn how to: - reorganize pipeline steps into a Dagger pipeline. - run Dagger a pipeline locally. - run Dagger a pipeline in a GitHub Actions workflow.
post.title: What to expect
